sourcesContent:
Usuario:
    {{dataUser.userName || 'No User Info'}}

import {OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {Component} from '@angular/core'; import {LayoutService} from './service/app.layout.service'; import {ActivatedRoute, Router} from "@angular/router"; import {AuthService} from "../service/auth/auth.service"; import {User} from "../models/user.model"; @Component({ selector: 'app-menu', templateUrl: './app.menu.component.html' }) export class AppMenuComponent implements OnInit { model: any[] = []; public dataUser: User = {} as User; constructor(public layoutService: LayoutService, private accountService: AuthService, private router: Router, private route: ActivatedRoute) { } ngOnInit() { this.model = []; if (this.accountService.sessionExists()) { this.dataUser = this.accountService.getDataUser()!; this.dataUser.userName this.model.push({ label: 'Usuario', items: [ {label: 'Registrar Receta', icon: 'pi pi-fw pi-pencil', routerLink: ['/medico/receta-create']}, {label: 'Mostrar Recetas', icon: 'pi pi-fw pi-list', routerLink: ['/medico/receta-listado']}, ] }); } } cerrarSession() { this.accountService.removeAccount(); this.router.navigate(['/login']); } }
